src:
Barcelona Tertarik Pinang Kai Havertz
06 Nov 2019, 15:30 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Juara La Liga, Barcelona diberitakan tertarik untuk menambah armada lini serang mereka. Tim asal Catalunya itu diberitakan ingin merekrut Kai Havertz dari Bayer Leverkusen.
Pada musim panas ini, Barcelona kehilangan salah satu playmaker mereka. Mereka meminjamkan Philippe Coutinho ke Bayern Munchen dengan opsi pembelian permanen.
Barca sendiri tidak mendatangkan pengganti Coutinho di musim panas kemarin. Alhasil skuat El Blaugrana diberitakan ingin mendatangkan playmaker baru dalam waktu dekat.
ESPN melansir bahwa Barcelona sudah memiliki satu target transfer untuk posisi itu. Mereka ingin mendatangkan Kai Havertz dari Bayer Leverkusen.

Mengapa Barcelona tertarik merekrut sang playmaker? Simak informasinya di bawah ini.
text:
Barcelona Interested In Pinang Kai Havertz
Nov 6 2019, 15:30 by Bola.net
Bola.net - La Liga champions, Barcelona are reportedly interested in adding to their attacking fleet. The Catalunya team reportedly wanted to recruit Kai Havertz from Bayer Leverkusen.
This summer, Barcelona lost one of their playmakers. They loaned Philippe Coutinho to Bayern Munich with a permanent purchase option.
Barca itself did not bring a replacement for Coutinho last summer. As a result the El Blaugrana squad was reported to want to bring in a new playmaker in the near future.
ESPN reported that Barcelona already has one transfer target for the position. They want to bring Kai Havertz from Bayer Leverkusen.

Why is Barcelona interested in recruiting the playmaker? Check out the information below.
